messages.title: BREXIT CAN BE BETTER
messages.content:
Dear Residents of Rochester & Strood,
Thank you for voting Brexit.
Don’t be fooled by Kelly Tolhurst or the Boris EU Treaty Deal that in no way allows Britain to take back control of our money, our borders, our laws, or our fishing waters.
This so-called deal hands the EU £39 billion for nothing. It does not give Britain back our democratic right to be a free and independent nation. It forces us to accept new laws and spending demands by a foreign government with no interest in the lives of the British people.
Say no to this deal. Vote for Roy Freshwater and UKIP’s manifesto on the 12th of December to send a message that you want to leave the European Union with a genuine Clean-Break Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Vote for Roy Freshwater and UKIP’s manifesto to leave the European Union with a genuine Clean-Break Brexit.
